articles.description: The continent's low vaccination rates are a result of ‘consequential failures’ in the distribution of jabs, rather than limited access
articles.content:
Low coronavirus vaccination rates across Africa are a result of consequential failures in the distribution of jabs, rather than limited access, a report has warned.
